Text: Calpine Changes to AB X Amend Cc All Calpine appreciates the opportunity to comment on the proposed amendments to AB X The proposed amendment would delete language now in section which provides The department shall have the same rights with respect to the payment by retail end use customers for power sold by the department as do providers of power to such customers That language is extremely useful for maintaining that the department may directly bill customers if for example the CPUC does not adopt a sufficient rate recovery mechanism It is very important to use that we keep that language intact I dont believe this should be a problem for any of you but please call me at if it is Thank you subscription protocolsdoc
